I had done some shopping on my own in Buenos Aires but it was very confusing because of the large range of quality of goods. I had complete confidence that Sophie only took me to the best stores. Make sure you bring cash because you can get discounts!

Great way to spend the day!. Sophie was incredibly helpful both before the tour, during it and also after it was finished. She shared lots of recommendations with us for restaurants and places to visit outside of BA - it was really appreciated and they were all a hit!The shopping was great, she tailored the tour to our interests which was great, and took us to some really out of the way places. The poor thing even ran around with the umbrella and hailed taxi's for us in the pouring rain!!She goes the extra mile, and we had a great time - Thanks!

Best idea ever!. Sophie was awesome! took us to some great hidden places and was always super attentive to your needs. Even after the tour we asked her for advice and she was always willing to help. Best way to shop in BA!

Best way to shop in the city!. I highly recommend Shop Hop tours to both tourists and expats living in Buenos Aires. Sophie is incredibly accommodating and customizes the tours based on your style and/or what you are looking to buy in the city. I've done two different tours and both having been a ton of fun. We got to visit show rooms, designer studios, and stores that I wouldn't have been able to find on my own. It's a must-do!

Simply The Best!. My husband and I had the most fantastic experience. Our only regret was that we could not spend more time with Sophie due to our travel schedule. Her suggestion of having a driver maximized our time though. Sophie was a delight to be with. Her knowledge of the city, fashion and unique artisans as well as the ability to know what appealed to us was amazing! We purchased some really beautiful and special pieces and when we had a "glitch" with a purchase, she really followed through for us!

Amazing experience, 100% recommended. My wife and I had heard from friends that Sophie's 'shop hop' was not one to miss and we weren't disappointed. I'm usually the one left dragging bags and staring at my watch but Sophie's charm, encyclopaedia-like knowledge and bespoke, flexible approach meant I was sorry to stop shopping and retreat to a local bar for a glass of wine... We got some great homeware, some handmade shoes, dresses, earrings and a super-stylish parilla set! For anyone wishing to make the most of the amazing array of fantastic shops and boutiques in BA this is a must-do!

Totally amazing. Sophie Loyd has made our trip to BA the most memorable experience of a lifetime. She was so helpful with suggestions and ideas; her personal attention and winning charm made all of our interactions fun and enjoyable. Can't thank you enough for all you have done to make this an such an amazing vacation for our family

Shopper's Delight! . As a solo traveller who loves to shop it was great to find Sophie. I was keen to shop on my first day in town. From completing the questionnaire and responding to many emails the day was organised so I could look at what I was interested in. Sophie is very knowledgable and took me to some cool places in Palermo. Taxi there and then we walked the streets, which was an added bonus as the area is lovely. Went to a jewellery designers workshop where the designer was more than happy to provide explanation on her work. Picked up some cool earrings. While I didn't buy heaps I got some great pieces which will remind me of Buenos Aires and this fun day. Sophie also gave recommendations on where to shop on my own. Finished the day with a glass of wine in the sunshine thanks to Sophie.

Personalized Shopping Tour. This tour is one of the best i have ever taken. Sophie showed me great places to shop. She personalized the entire tour by asking just a few questions and it was perfect. I am a crafter and was interested in finding great yarn for my knitting and crocheting, she took me to wonderful stores for Argentinian wool yarn and I ended up coming back over and over again. We visit some showrooms for shoes, leather purses and jewelry (I came back and shop at all of them after the tour). I recommend taking this tour to anyone who is visiting Buenos Aires. Sophie also had great recommendations for lunch and tango classes. She really goes above and beyond. =)

A must do if you are a shopper!!. Booked this half day tour for three women with whom I was traveling and myself. Sophie recommended a private car to maximize our shopping time and it was well worth it. If we had known how good Sophie was we probably would have booked her for a full day. It is important to provide the information Sophie requests from you ahead of time so she can tailor your shopping experience to your desires. Sophie was very proactive by email prior to our shopping trip asking questions to refine the tour and went way above our expectations of service. We would certainly use her again and highly recommend her service.

Superb shopping trip!. I booked a half-day shopping tour with Sophie at the last minute during a stay in Buenos Aires, and I'm so glad I did. From the survey she sent before the tour through to the tour itself, everything was very personalized - tailored to my style, preferences and budget. We visited a number of boutiques and local stores, some by appointment, including an incredible apartment full of vintage clothing. I picked up some great pieces I wouldn't find anywhere else, and had a wonderful afternoon with Sophie. She is very friendly, knows the city well and has plenty of great ideas. We finished the tour with a glass of wine, and she even followed up the tour with a list of other recommendations for me to check out in my remaining days in BA. I thoroughly enjoyed the tour and definitely recommend it!

Even My Husband Enjoyed It!. Sophie is lovely to talk with. She took us to places we would never have found on our own. We met and spoke to artisans about their work which helped us understand their creative process. We had leather jackets made to measure by the nicest people who made sure they were a perfect fit before we left. My husband dislikes shopping, but he enjoyed this experience.

Beyond My Expectations. Having never been on a 'shopping' trip while on vacation before, so we really did not know what to expect when booking this tour. I can say now without hesitation that I would recommend Shop Hop BA as an excellent way to spend a day! Sophie was friendly and accommodating......we had several unique requests so besides showing us stunning leather and silversmithing she listened to our requests and made it happen! We went home with exactly what we were looking for. When we go back to BA, I will definitely book another day with Sophie.

Unforgettable Experience. My husband and I were on our honeymoon in Buenos Aires, and he decided to treat me to a day of shopping with Sophie. It was an unforgettable experience! Sophie was a great companion for the day, and it was so helpful to have her communicate to shop owners (as I don't speak Spanish). BA has so many shops, and the city is so big I would have never found what I wanted without Sophie's guidance. I would do it again in a heartbeat!

Shopping with Sophie Lloyd - An exceptional experience!. My husband and I booked a half-day with Sophie several weeks before we left for Buenos Aires. We had lived in New York City for several years and sensed that shopping in BA would be similar - different neighborhoods, different price points, and many hidden jewels that we wouldn't find on our own. Sophie did not disappoint; in fact, she exceeded our expectations. We filled out her questionnaire then sent a few emails back and forth to fine-tune the agenda, which included having a leather jacket custom-made for my husband and fulfilling my interest in artisan crafts, leather accessories and shoes. Upon arrival in BA the weather was in the 90's so we added a car & driver to our plan, easily handled by Sophie. She met us at our hotel and whisked us away on an afternoon of fun and adventure. We were impressed with every showroom and shop she took us to as well as her knowledge of the BA fashion scene and best designers. There was never any pressure to buy but we knew our dollars were well spent when we did...on our custom-made leather jackets (yes, I could not resist), a terrific pair of shoes, a leather tote and unique jewelry. Getting to know us throughout the afternoon, and knowing we would be back through BA the following week, Sophie made recommendations for other shops and restaurants to visit on our return...and she was spot on in meeting our interests and tastes. Thank you, Sophie!

great shopper, great resource. We worked with Sophie and boy does she know BA and its shopping. Custom made top of the line leather coats from her recommendation and introduction...wow what a deal. Anyone going to BA, needs to hire Sophie Lloyd as your shopping guide. Also incredibly knowledgeable about restaurants in various areas of the city.

Excellent day of shopping in BA!. I had a great day of shopping with Sophie. Not only is she very knowledgeable about the shopping in BA she's a fun person to be around. We went to stores I would have never found without her help. I got an amazing custom-made leather jacket and also found some great custom made shoes. Sophie tailored the tour to my specific needs and took the time to figure out my particular style. I would highly recommend this to anyone wanting to shop in BA. It was such a pleasure to meet Sophie, she was one of the most fun, hilarious and kind people I had the opportunity to meet.

ShopHop "Customized Shopping Itinerary". My wife and I were not able to do the Full-Day tour with Sophie, so we signed up for the Customized Shopping Itinerary instead. It starts with a simple questionnaire designed to gauge your preferences/style. She then follows up with a PDF that includes a brief description of her recommendations, along with a map at the end, with clear/helpful instructions for which stops require a cab, which can be walked, etc.From the start, my wife and I were impressed with the way Sophie coordinated BOTH our questionnaires. Meaning, she made recommendations to me and my wife separately, but she clearly designed it in a way that we could spend the day together. There were some places where there was overlap, and some that were dedicated to women or men, but close to each other. It all felt deliberate.Then we actually arrived, and started exploring on our own (we saved Sophie's suggestions for later in the week). This was neat, because we were able to explore shops and already see which designers/styles/etc. were working for us and which ones weren't. Then came time to dig into Sophie's recommendations...We are discerning (is that just a nice word for picky?). Let's just say we have the capacity to be critical. From the very start, we were PLEASANTLY surprised (and impressed) that Sophie's recommendations were absolutely spot-on in terms of delivering styles that rang true to us, as well as pushing us just a touch beyond our comfort zone (exactly as we suggested in our questionnaires). Now, having done personal shopping tours before, we haven't always felt like the professional on the other end was in-tune with our wavelength. Sophie, however, crushed it. I'd say just about EVERY recommendation was time well spent.She knows Buenos Aires, but maybe more importantly, she seemed to really GET what we were going for. My wife and I were really impressed and grateful. And her pricing is not just competitive, it's a steal.Recommend the itinerary highly, and I'd imagine her personal shopping tours are excellent as well, judging from the quality of this particular option.

Fun way to see the city!. Really enjoyed the comprehensive list of shops and boutiques I had put together. Because it was the holiday season many of the business were closed so we did not get to see them. I liked that the locations were organized by neighborhood and there was clearly a lot of thought put into the selection based on our requests.

Great shopping trip. Sophie asked before the trip what we wpuld like to shop for so she scheduled the trip around what we wanted to see and buy. We were looking for mostloy leather goods and she toook us to some small private wholesalers where we got some great deals and got to meet the person that actually made the purses

Girls Shopping Trip. After we had booked a trip with Sophie, she sent us an email asking about our style and what type of shopping we were interested in doing. She took us to stores in Ricoletta and Palermo but also to private boutiques where we were able to purchase belts, purses and other items at wholesale. Great experience!

A really great day (and my husband enjoyed it too!). What a great day we had with Sophie. Not only did we (OK, mainly "I"!) come away with some very cool things that we'd never have found ourselves, it was also a great way to explore parts of the city. We went into private showrooms, and met designers and craftspeople, all of which are just not accessible to the average visitor. My husband enjoyed this aspect, and the craft beers sampled at the end of the day. Sophie was great at figuring out what I wanted to look at and do, and then hit them all! Sophie was also excellent company and gave us some great eating and drinking recommendations. She was also fantastic with some follow up help on a couple of things, that we were particularly grateful for. We've done a few shopping tours in different cities now, as a means to get a "normal" view of city life and (for me at least) finding some local gems which serve as great reminders of the city. Each tour is different, but we are never disappointed (I'm usually looking at the shops, but my husband comes along too and always enjoys himself). This trip, with Sophie, was no exception. Highly recommended.

When shopping malls are not your thing. Having never been to Buenos Aires before, it was a pleasure to have Sophie accompany me for half a day to show me stores that were more specialized and unique to BA. I wasn't interested in clothes or shoes; goods that any normal shopper would be. I was interested in the handmade and artisan made goods ranging from jewelry to indigenous crafts. Sophie had plenty of places in mind that held my attention. She clearly has her finger on the shopping pulse in BA. Shop Hop BA is a terrific alternative to going to the malls, and you get to settle in with a glass of wine at the end of the tour. Sophie followed up after the tour to provide me excellent recommendations for restaurants. All in all, an excellent time spent with a warm and knowledgeable person.

Fantastic afternoon with Sophie. Sophie is amazing! She took me to boutiques I would have never found on my own and helped me find the most incredible leather purse. I wasn't shopping for much, just a purse and a dress that were unique. There was no pressure to buy anything.Sophie had called ahead to private boutiques to show me some beautiful handbags and of course the first place we went to I fell in love with a purse that is timeless and I will have forever. A lovely reminder of my time in Buenos Aires.Sophie is also a stylist and has a wonderful eye. And she's lived such an interesting life! I was travelling by myself and it was great to enjoy her company for the day.This is definitely a worthwhile excursion. Sophie will customize the experience to fit your needs and budget.And if that wasn't enough, she gave me some great recommendations of bars, restaurants and experiences to enjoy during my stay.She definitely went above and beyond to create a wonderful afternoon of shopping and more!Highly, highly recommended!!!!

Amazing Tour with Sophie!. My husband and I love to travel and decided to do something different on this trip and book a shopping tour with Sophie. We had the best day! Sophie took us to designers' showrooms and amazing boutiques. It was so wonderful to have Sophie take us to hidden gems and show us how to find unique, quality pieces. It was a special experience to talk to the designers and experience their passion for their work. There is no pressure to buy, but we found so many things we loved -- clothes and shoes for both of us, jewelry, handbags, and other souvenirs. Most importantly, Sophie is not only a fantastic guide but a great person. We felt like we were shopping with a friend. Our only regret is not spending more time with Sophie! She gave us some excellent recommendations to explore shops and restaurants on our own. If you enjoy shopping, Sophie's tour is a must do in Buenos Aires!

AMAZING! Sophie is the BOMB!. Sophie is not only a terrific clothing and shop advisor--she is incredibly good company and gave me one of my most pleasurable days of two full weeks in Buenos Aires. It was so much fun being out and about with Sophie. She is extremely knowledgable and took to exactly the right shops that matched my personal tastes and interests. I loved meeting the shop owners/designers, and ended up purchasing a leather jacket (custom made, gorgeous and very reasonable), many pairs of hand-made designer shoes that were elegant and hip, and other beautiful leather items for gifts. Sophie even hooked me up with a woman who runs a weekly open mike/music night at an amazing local club/bar, and I was invited to come perform (I'm a musician and songwriter). That was an unforgettable experience--would have never happened but for Sophie.

Great insight into the shops and tailors. We had a great time with Sophie who really tailored this for our needs. Not only did we get what we wanted but had a great time! I am very particular with my clothes but the tailors that Sophie took us too were able to combine about 2 photos and some alterations to create my perfect leather jacket all in 3 days and for a very good price.

Great Way to Shop in BA!. If you are looking for a unique way to experience the Buenos Aires shopping scene, then this is the way to do it! Sohipe did an incredible job of knowing what we were looking for before we arrived in the city, so all of the places we visited were very on point. We were able to visit several places that we would have no way of knowing about without Sophie, and she also gave us numerous suggestions for places to visit after our time with here was finished. This was a great experience with an incredibly knowledgable, helpful and friendly guide.

My Favorite BA Experience. I had an amazing time on our private shopping tour with Sophie. Right off the bat, she was easy to talk to, and I felt like she took the time prior to our meeting to learn about us and what we were looking for. I had really high hopes for this tour, and it by far exceeded my expectations. She's very talented, gives great advice and truly inspirational. If you are new to the BA shopping scene, she is definitely the person to ease you in. When we go back, we will definitely seek her out again.

Great experience with Sophie!. If you are looking for unique designer Argentine clothes, or for an opportunity to get into some exclusive galleries, this is a great way to do so. Sophie was a fun and knowledgeable host. She asked a lot of questions before we went out so she could steer us in the right direction. We ended up buying several things and would definitely recommend for others.

Best day in Buenos Aires, Sophie is fantastic!. Coming from London with my father we were already spoilt for shopping choice back home so didn’t know what to expect from Buenos Aires. Based on TA reviews we decided to book with Sophie. Sophie far exceeded our expectations in every way. She planned out a fantastic itinerary, incorporating all our far ranging requests and led us to fascinating places where we were able to find both what we wanted and more. Overall I can't recommend Sophie highly enough- whatever your shopping needs, they will be surpassed and spent in great company too! Thank you again Sophie!

Excellent shopping guide of Bs As. As a Buenos Aires tour guide myself I was happy to find SHopHop as something special to add to my guests experiences.... I try to use local experts as they have their finger on the ever chafing pulse of Buenos Aires. If you are short on time, and really want to focus on finding the 'perfect' something... anything... Sophie is the girl for you! Not only can she calmly and expertly guide through the many options available but takes you to those special places you would never have found alone as well. We took the option of hiring a people mover which further maximised our shopping time and made the outing feel very personalised. During our time together Sophie made a number of other recommendations throughout the City for restaurants, bars, other retailers...many of which I followed up, all of which were excellent! In a City which changes constantly and is teeming with variety...ShopHop helps you navigate and thus use your holiday time optimally.

HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! SOPHIE IS A STAR!. Sophie was a delightful and knowledgeable guide and a great source of new shopping experiences .... Highly recommended in every way. Cant wait for my next trip to discover more hidden delights!! Thanks so much for two very interesting tours and being so incredibly helpful. DMI

Great experience - a lifesaver for shoppers in BA!. I came to Buenos Aires having read that it has some of the best shopping in the world, but it struck me pretty quickly upon arriving that it can be a very difficult city to navigate, especially with limited spanish, and that i was going to have trouble finding all the shops I wanted without spending all my time on public Transport. A friend who visited last year recommended me Sophie and ShopHop and It was easily the best decision I made during my time in BA. As well as having a keen eye for fashion, Sophie was great company and the whole day was a really fun experience. Her knowledge of the city and it's hidden gems combined with here excellent spanish let you know that you're in good hands and that you're getting the best out of the city. We spent a whole day out shopping and I came back with some really nice pieces. The only regret I have is not booking another day!

Save Time & Worries. A friend who once lived in Argentina recommended Shop Hop BA and Sophie Lloyd. If you want to get shopping done efficiently and effectively hire Sophie to take you around Buenos Aires (BA) and show you where to shop. The last time I was in BA i struggled to find the things that i was shopping for. With Sophie, i spent a half a day with her where she toured me around to custom design merchants who created exactly the items i was looking for which ranged from custom jewelry to custom leatherwear and wine. I am so pleased with my items that I am going hire her again on my next visit later this year.

A Truly Unique Experience!!. Sophie has an encyclopaedic knowledge of Buenos Aires, off the beaten track showrooms. She has an excellent fashion sense and eye for Men's and Women's fashion. It was a truly fun and interesting tour of Buenos Aires' best mens showrooms. I would highly recommend Sophie to anyone passing through or living in Buenos Aires.

Book early for a fun unique experience!. Sophie knows her travel and fashion. This was a fun shopping tour of Buenos Aires from an experienced world traveller who knows her fashion and people. The best shopping areas in Buenos Aires from a locals perspective. BA. is about local brands and designers. This is something you need help with. My wife was able to complete outfits with unique pieces in an afternoon that would have take days if we were lucky. She bridged the language gap while shopping and taking taxis. Helped negotiate the final pricing and where to find the unique value we were looking for. It was great help to have. Wish we had done this earlier in the trip. This afternoon gave us the modern culture we wanted to experience after the regular tours. I was able to leave my wife in good hands while I explored on my own the areas Sophie took us to. She quickly customized our visit to what we needed and gave great insight into the city and culture to help with the rest of our visit. Thanks Sophie!

Fun shopping experience!. This is a great way to spend an afternoon with a group of friends, exploring the hidden shopping gems of Buenos Aires. I've been on 2 different shopping tours with Sophie so far and each time I have walked away with beautiful, unique, or fun items that I wouldn't have otherwise found on my own. The appointment-only designer showrooms are worth the shopping trip alone. While there's never any pressure to buy from any of the shops that you visit, you will undoubtedly walk away with one or two treasured pieces!

Sophie's TIGRE Shop Hop Tour. Sophie is the BOMB! I don't know how she finds all the hidden places within every neighborhood in BsAs but she does. We visited a home in Olivos on the way to Tigre where a Mom and daughter have a homemade rug/throw/shawl business made of wool and lama and they are gorgeous. The items are weaved on looms and the best part is everything is made where the weavers live which supports the area/country as well as making these marvelous items available to us. I also saw a part of Tigre I had no idea existed and we finished off the day with vinto tinto and a delicious sandwich and salad in a very unique cafe/boutique. It was a lovely day! Gracias Sophie! : )

Sophie is the Best. Sophie took us to the best spots in Argentina. A lot of them were hidden and we would have never found them ourselves. She took us up into designer's apartments and showed us handbags that were unique and weren't the kind in department stores. My daughter and I were in heaven. Her Spanish was great and she was able to communicate with everyone for us perfectly. I had some trouble trying to buy things and she was able to translate everything for me. Great girl, great shopping, great tour. If you have time to do this, DO IT!

The best part of our whole trip!. We spent an entire day with Sophie and she knew exactly where to take us!!! We even asked for more time, and she was more than willing to extend the hours. She had perfect Spanish which was great since we didn't know much, and she was able to tell our styles and take us to places that fit our preferences. It was such a great way to see Argentina and so much fun to connect with such a great girl. If you love to shop, contact Sophie!!

A tailor-made experience !!. She made me spend a rainy day in a best way, thanks again...I would definitely recomend to anyone who wants to shop around the city like a local...And she is very good at picking what you like and offer the best alternatives within a very short time.....Also she is not limited with the time that you pay or info that ask for....she is kindly providing any information even after.....So yes contact to her and experience a job done properly...

Ace!. I had the pleasure of meeting Sophie, and her knowledge, welcome and kindness was second to none! Its a really hard city to navigate, understand and find, but Sophie is an ace and in no time helped me navigate Buenos Aires and its shopping potential.Highly recommended to anyone visiting :) x

A must-do for shopaholics!. i spent two hours with Sophie and had an absolute blast. I booked my time very last minute and she was brilliant, taking my preferences (detailed!) and my budget (small!) and turning it into a tailor-made tour of stores I would never have found by myself (including the amazing B.Lit bags!).So a big thank you to Sophie and 5 stars from me.

Great experience. As we have never been to BA, we booked Sophie for an afternoon to guide us around. After a nice email-contact, she met exactly our preferences, led us to vintage fashion shops, upcoming leather manufacturers and extravagant fashion designers. We were really astonished and extremely pleased by this tour, as it showed a completely other, not touristic side of this big city. We would have loved to meet Sophie earlier during our stay, as she knows so many special neighbourhood cafes and spaces, nobody finds without a guide. Her open minded and friendly character was a mere pleasure. Thank you so much!

Fantastic experience!. I had a great experience shopping with Sophie! After emailing back and forth for a few days, she put together an itinerary for our half-day together, and she really knocked it out of the park. I bought some beautiful jewelry, gorgeous shoes and a custom leather jacket. I really appreciated having Sophie take me to shops and private showrooms that I never would have known about as a tourist. I am a little shy, so I was nervous about spending four hours with someone I had never met before, but Sophie was so easy to talk to - the time flew by! I would highly recommend her services - even if you don't think you're fancy enough to hire a shopping guide. It's very affordable, and Sophie will help you find the perfect wearable souvenirs that will always remind you of your time in wonderful Buenos Aires!

Awesome Shopping Guide and Stylist!. I had a wonderful experience shopping with Sophie. I've been to Buenos Aires many times and wanted to find some new places to shop. I contacted Sophie and we arranged a half day shopping trip. It was like going shopping with a very stylish friend. She took me to a lot of local artisan shops - leather, handbags, shoes, clothing. We even went to a local clothing designer's showroom. Needless to say, I bought a lot of beautiful things that I absolutely love. I will definitely call Sophie next time I'm down in Buenos Aires....and you should too!!

Best way to shop BA. Sophie is an amazing guide and has access to all the most stylish shops and showrooms in Buenos Aires. Her tour is a wonderful way to get to know the local fashion scene, a must for any visitor or local interested in some serious shopping!

Great experience. We really enjoyed our time with Sophie, having arranged for a 1/2 day immediately upon our arrival into town. Sophie took us to many stores, including a high-end leather shop, a great designer handbag boutique, a fabulous soap store (yes), and a variety of other unique shops. She was a pleasure to spend time with, and we never felt compelled to buy anything anywhere.We actually had a slight problem with one of the stores, and Sophie handled everything perfectly, making sure that we were very happy with our purchases. Highly recommended and fun!

Shopping experience in Buenos Aires !. It was my first time in Buenos Aires and one of the things that I will remember is the Shop Hop BA experience with Sophie. It combines shopping and fun, it was so different from the way I use to do my shopping. Thank you again to Sophie who shares her best address !

Shopping at it's best. My friend found Sophie through TripAdvisor, and she couldn't have found a better thing for our trip to BA! We spent half a day with Sophie, and loved every single spot she brought us. There's no doubt, we wouldn't have found any of these hidden gems without her insight! Sophie tailored the tour to our wants, and it was perfect! My only complaint was that I was out of money after spending the day shopping. Don't miss shopping with Sophie on your trip to BA!

Shopping Adventures in BA. I have been on a number of ShopHops with Sophie and its always been a discovery of all that is weird & wonderful about the 'closed door' culture in this city. The best shops (retail or otherwise) and tucked away in hidden corners of the city and Sophie does a great job of finding these places and sharing them with you. Always a fun adventure!

Shop Hop merits being on the list of things to do in Buenos Aires. Make your shopping experience efficient and fun by signing up for Sophie's shopping tour. I have lived in this city for years and never been to the hand picked places Sophie exposed me to. I have been on two tours and hope to do more!
Very helpful and very knowledgable!. I recommend getting a car. Sophie knew the city well and was very accommodating. I recommend at least 5 hours if you have 2 people. The time flies quickly.

A Pro who Knows Her Stylish City. On my first time in BA, Sophie really showed me the style ropes, getting me inside appointment-only showrooms like a vintage trove in an old world apartment, a handmade shoe workshop and cool housewares dens. She's warm, in-the-know and fabulous — I'd recommend her to anyone, and wish other cities had a Sophie!

Sharing the Love of Shopping. Shop Hop was the highlight of my trip to Buenos Aires. Not only did I return from holiday with a closet full of new clothes ...I left having made a new friend too. Sophie is a gem. She was generous with her time and connected me to an entire network of local designers and showrooms I would have completely missed otherwise. All the shops were under the radar and off the grid. My tour was perfectly tailored to my personal taste. Truly one of a kind. I would recommend Shop Hop to anyone who loves fashion, shopping and believes there´s no other way to get to know a city than with a local by your side.

Fantastic day out shopping in San Telmo. I've recently moved to Buenos Aires, and a colleague recommended Sophie's shopping tour. I've never done anything like it and didn't know what to expect. Sophie turned out to be so lovely and friendly, and clearly knows fashion and all the coolest places to go in BsAs! I met very nice people on the tour, discovered great shops and a gorgeous bar to end the tour in style with wine and cheese - it was a terrific day. I loved San Telmo, and I will definitely go on the other tours in Recoleta and Palermo (maybe Belgrano) and hopefully get a tailored one for friends visiting over Christmas/New Year. Make sure you add this to your list of must-do's in BsAs!

A unique exclusive shopping experience and fun day out!. Having been here for a few months but not really shopped much in Buenos Aires, apart from the odd outlet or highstreet store, it was great to go to some hidden tucked away gems that I never would have known about had it not been for Sophie’s tour. On top of her extensive fashion designer contacts throughout the city, Sophie is extremely knowledgeable when it comes to each indiviual designer, and has a great eye for what looks good and what doesn’t.With the intention of just buying a gift for a friend, I also came home with a dress, skirt and handbag for myself all from different unique designers, including one amazing vintage showroom that I could have spent hours in and will definitely go back to. A lot of the places we visited were showrooms inside the designers’ homes so it really felt like we were getting an exclusive experience, as well as seeing some amazing old Argentine mansions! One designer even gave us a glass of champagne each while we browsed.There were 6 of us on the tour but at no point did we feel rushed, and everyone had time to shop at their leisure with the help of Sophie to find things they liked, so it felt very personalised.If you want to buy some unique things from Buenos Aires which you will never find shopping on your average store in the street, Sophie’s tour is ideal – a fun day out with a warm and friendly host, and a glass of wine to end with!

Better than local. I am Argentinian And got The tour as a birthday gift. This Was The most exciting And exclusive shopping i ever Did in my own city. Sophie knows secret places And makes a difference by making the entire experience focus on you. As an extra to finish the day, a perfect glass of wine. Thank you Sophie for showing innovating And exclusive showrooms And designers. I definetly recomend her.

Made a Profound Difference !!. We set about planning our 5 night stay two months or more out and Sophie made sure she extracted every detail possible in order to make our shopping experience meaningful... We gave her a hard time on site firing her with so many varying wants and needs but she took it all in her stride and shone a light through it all with a charming personality..We left BA laden with so much leather goods, jackets, bags etc that packing it all was a challenge.Since our return we have done nothing but show it all off as the Winter sets in back home in the Northern Hemisphere.Sophie made our visit memorable and we could not recommend her more highly ...

Great shopping experience in Buenos Aires. This is such a unique and memorable way to experience the city of Buenos Aires. I love clothes but wouldn't say I'm a keen shopper and Sophie made the whole experience such a treat and so enjoyable. It's a great day out and wonderful to see another side to the city, meet locals and treat yourself!

Brilliant shopper, wonderful Sophie is super efficient and amazingly tapped into local shopping scene.. Sophie knew I was traveling to Argentina to get outfitted for my destination wedding (and a tango class!), that I wasn't a great shopper, that I couldn't say for certain what my non traditional attire should look like, my budget was right and I wouldn't have much time. She wasn't worried! She sent me a brief and painless survey, then sent me some designers to check out on Facebook prior to traveling. We emailed back and forth a couple times and as a result I felt more confident and clear in what I was looking for, but I was also better packed! She helped me focus in on what key pieces - shoes and pants - would help me keep my options open. When we met in person we hit the ground running and not only did I find the perfect outfit and shoes to get married in and enjoy Argentina, I met incredible people! Sophie has made super cool connections in vintage AND designer shops, in addition to jeweler and leather shops that would have been impossible to find on my own. She was so good at hitting just the right stores for my needs that everywhere we went we found success and we also had enough time to swing into an awesome leather shop where I picked up my favorite souvenir handbag made of the finest Argentine leather - it smells so good!! This non-shopper is eternally grateful for such a fun and adventurous experience with such a cool, laid back and down to earth person. Muchas gracias Sophie!

Sophie helped me find the perfect wedding dress!. Sophie has brought me to showrooms and shops of all sorts that I could have never found on my own. Because of her I've really gotten to enjoy the truly unique shopping scene of Buenos Aires. I came to trust Sophie so much that I asked her to help me find a wedding dress. We spent a whole day visiting vintage shops and designer showrooms in search of the perfect dress and shoes. Sophie is so kind, and all of the designers and shop owners were very welcoming when we arrived. Sophie was patient and honest about everything I tried on. By the end of the day I had found a beautiful, one of a kind wedding dress and a killer pair of shoes. I felt amazing on my wedding day, and I have Sophie to thank for that. Having worked in the fashion industry in NY & Milan, I have high expectations when it comes to shopping and fashion- and Sophie has absolutely exceeded them.

Unique experience one can't miss. Me and my girlfriend read about Sophie's private guided shopping tours and were immediately interested in getting to know some exclusive spots for fashion in the heart of Buenos Aires. Having booked a whole day tour with Sophie was the best thing we could ever do! We got to know fashion boutiques we usually would have never seen by passing through "just" the "normal" shopping districts. My girlfriend was searching for a special pair of shoes and Sophie knew exactly where to find it. It seemed like she knew everything about fashion and where to find it in this big amazing city. If you come to Buenos Aires, I can just recommend booking a tour with Sophie, even if you don't search for something in particular, you will guaranteed find some nice things and see a lot of secret spots in the city!

Had a GREAT time!. Sophie really knows all the neighborhoods in Buenos Aires. She takes you to all the "jewels" of the city that you otherwise wouldn't know existed. It was a great day with a great group and I can't wait for the next Shop Hop BA Tour!Deb M : )

You're in good hands with Sophie. A day shopping with Sophie is more than just shopping. You enter the secret world of local designers and their ateliers. You receive excellent customer service and great prices. Our recent tour started in Recoleta at an exclusive leather handbag shop, moved on to a friendly shoe designer (with delicious home made treats), a stop at a jewelry designer, an exotic leather and jewelry boutique, an ultra chic life style shop in Palermo and as a wonderful touch, wine and snacks on a private roof top of a boutique hotel. All of these places are very hard to find but Sophie made it an easy and fun afternoon. Don't miss this private tour during your stay in BA.

Discover the Beast of BA. I have done 3 shopping trip so far with Sophie and every single time I have discovered new gems in this city. Sophie has a way of showcasing the best of BA in a well-curated manner and she's got an excellent ear to the ground to help you get the best deals on everything from fashion to home decor to leather to jewellery and everything in-between. She is great at organizing the logistics and every trip ends at a fabulous restaurant (always another discovery) where you can put your feet up after a hard day of shopping! I highly recommend Sophie's Unique BA Shopping Adventures!

A Perfect Shopping Expedition!. Wow! I knew I would enjoy it, but this was incredibly fun and beyond any expectations I had! Sophie's plan for the day was terrific, she took us to places we never would have found on our own and was a most excellent guide and companion to us all. She had great information on the designers/venues we visited and knew the products, materials and history of each. The rhythm and pacing of the day was also great -- plenty of time at each location but also keeping the group moving so as not to miss the next venue. The group also had great chemistry, lots of laughs, sharing and great connects. I really did lose all track of time in the best way! I 100% recommend Sophie's Shop Hop outings if you are visiting Buenos Aires but also if you live here.

Sophie is the best! she help us to meet new great designers, all in only one day!. She knows everything about the fashion tendency from Buenos Aires. We kept in contact with many great designers on their showroom and we also got a great discount as an advantage. I definitely recommend this Shop Tour also for Argentinians who want to find out uncommon artisans things and not taylor made. thank you!

A wonderful day out in Buenos Aires!. I had a wonderful day on the shop hop tour! Its a great way to find some hidden fashion gems that you would never find on your own. Sophie really knows her stuff - she carefully tailors each tour depending on the participants and for the 8 in the group I was with she really got it spot on. I honestly cannot recommend this enough! If you really want to see Argentine fashion, this is the only way to do it! Thanks so much Sophie!

Best way to shop in BA. I have lived in BA for over a year and shopping is something that I find so daunting. There are so many shops and so much tat that I almost avoid shopping completely. So thank GOD for Shop Hop BA! We went to such a great variety of shops. I especially loved the leather shoes by Jessica Kessel, which are amazing and actually so reasonably priced, and the vintage shop. It was really clear as well that Sophie has a great relationship with all the shop owners that we went to. Aside from taking the stress out of shopping, it was also a super fun day out and I met some really nice people and felt a lot girlier that I usually do, which made a really nice change! Finishing the day off with some hand-picked Argentine wines and cheeses was also a really lovely touch. GO ON THIS TOUR!!!

My tour with Sophie exceeded all expectations!. This past Saturday I went on a group tour with Sophie that took us to private showrooms and exclusive boutiques in the Palermo area. I've lived here for 4.5 years and I still have no clue where to shop! Sophie obviously has a ton of knowledge and a great in with the best designers in the city and she took us to places that we would have never been able to find out about otherwise. It was truly exclusive. Not only were the shops really cool, but Sophie was professional, fun, and really helpful. At the end of the day we finished at a lovely place for wine and cheese. Her tour exceeded my already high expectations! I highly recommend her to anyone with shopping needs, whether you're a local, an expat living here, or someone just passing through on vacation.

What a wonderful day!!!!. I had an amazing group shopping tour experience this weekend. It was so much fun walking around to different designers with all the girls. We were trying on clothes and shoes, checking out handbags, putting on jewelry... the day flew by! Sophie's knowledge is priceless and her company is also something to be desired :) I was able to buy everything that I had been looking for, plus more stuff that I didn't realize I needed (wanted). In the end we had a nice wine and cheese celebration, so typical of Buenos Aires! I met some great people and really did have a blast :) I highly recommend ANY shopping experience you might get the chance to have with Miss Sophie.

Best decision on my trip to BA. Shopping with Sophie was an absolute blast! She was prepared with a perfect selection of shops that saved me from wasting a lot of time had I been shopping solo. Sophie definitely knows the BA fashion scene, leading me to an amazing, and rather hidden, boutique shoe shop that I would have never found on my own. Her knowledge of local currency and customs was also invaluable. I just keep wondering why I haven't looked for personal shopping services in other cities, since this was a definite highlight of my trip to BA.

Sophie absolutely made my BA shopping experience. I booked a day shopping tour with Shop Hop BA and bought exactly what I was looking for, thanks to Sophie. I came away with a BEAUTIFUL leather jacket, custom made with the softest leather and at a fraction of the price I'd pay in the UK. Sophie knew exact where to go and what I was looking for. A really amazing experience which finished my BA holiday perfectly. Not only is Sophie incredibly clued up as to where to go, she is also a lovely, patient and incredibly warm and friendly girl - I felt like I was shopping with a friend! Thanks Shop Hop BA! x

Shop Hop BA. Shopping with Sofie was an absolute delight! There are so many shops and boutiques in BA and Sofie took me to the best BA had to offer for all the things I wanted. Sofie has really done her research and is knowledgable on the local designers. Buying a tailored made leather coat and purse at a great price was fantastic but the highlight of the trip was finding many things I have been looking for all in 4 hours. After shopping, to enjoy a nice glass of wine sitting outside at one of BA many cafés is an added bonus. I would highly recommend this to anyone who wants to enjoy a unique shopping experience in BA, whether you have limited time or on an extended stay.

Wonderful day shopping with Sophie. Had 4+ hours of touring best places to shop with Sophie on January 26, 2014.She took us to jewelery, leather and handbag shops, as well as, to San Telmo market.She saved us lots of wasted time and energy by showing us places of high quality and excellent prices. She met us at our hotel and had the itinerary mapped out in advance.We took cabs to get around and made the most of our time. Before our visit she asked about kinds of things we wanted to shop for and she hit the "bullseye".My wife said she could have shopped with Sophie all day long!Highly recommend.

Awesome shopping tour!. I did a shopping tour with Shop Hop BA when I went there on holiday and I really enjoyed it! Got a great leather jacket and an amazing handbag. I enjoyed visiting the various private showrooms. Sophie showed me some great, tucked away places that I wouldn't have found on my own and gave great insight into the local design scene. She even gave me some good personal styling advice. Highly recommend Sophie's tours - she is friendly yet professional and really knows the fashion scene and best places to shop in BA.

Great shopping trip. Sophie is great! She knows all the good spots and she's really good at figuring out what types of clothes you'll like. She's also incredibly nice and fun to talk to. I had a two hour tour and we covered a lot of ground and I was able to get everything I was looking for. I highly recommend Shop Hop BA.

Super ending to a super holiday in Argentina!! . I had the best day with Miriam on my hack- and can only reiterate what all the previous reviewers have said- memories to cherish for sure. Challenging in a good way for those that ride european style but feeling utterly safe with Miriam's patient guidance. Thanks a million to Miriam, Adrian, Tito and Maria for making my 2nd last day of holiday one of the best.Going back to Ireland a very happy cailin- go raibh mile mile maith agaibh.

Basically exactly what I was hoping for. I cannot say enough--the surroundings are spectacular, the horses are impeccably trained but still full of spirit, and Adrian and Miriam were hospitality itself and excellent, patient instructors. Would recommend unreservedly for any level of riding experience. This was probably the highlight of my trip, hands down.

A great escape from the city in beautiful surroundings. Myself and my boyfriend did the horse riding trip with Miriam and had a fantastic day!We only had 4 days in BA but wanted to see a little bit of the countryside so this trip was ideal for us. From the initial point of booking, the communication and organisation was friendly and professional. Miriam arranged pick up at a central location in BA and we were taken to a beautiful park about 40 minutes drive out of the city. We were both beginner house riders but by the end we were cantering freely through the forest and feeling very confident. The Horses are beautifully kept and very well trained and the direction from Miriam was great - this is definitely much more than a standard trek through a nice area which you might expect on these types of trips. As well as the tuition, Miriam and her family are wonderful hosts - friendly and welcoming and full of local knowledge about Argentina so we really enjoyed talking to her - and especially the mate and delicious home made empanadas! :-) We were lucky to have great weather on this day but even without it was lovely to see something more than just the city. I would definitely recommend this to anyone wanting to see a little more than the usual tourist sites.

A great experience!. We had an amazing day in Caballos A La Par. Miriam and Adrian really made us feel welcome straight from the start and the whole experience just felt like hanging out with friends in a beautiful park while riding such nice horses. Also no worries, if you don't have any experience on horses before, you will learn quickly here! Definitely something we will do again if we have the chance! Worth every penny :)

Home away from home!!. Last week my sister and I had a wonderful experience at Caballos A La Par! We booked a private tour and Adrien and Mirjam made sure that everything was more than perfect. We were lucky that we had a beautiful sunny day for riding and we started the experience with drinking mate, a typical Argentinian tradition. After that we started our trip with 3 beautiful horses, 2 Arabs and one traditional Argentinian horse. Because of our work my sister and I are blessed that we can ride at different places around the world, and what for us makes the difference is that Adrien and Mirjam not only treat their guests as family, but even more important, the horses are like family to them!! In a Argentinian economy where making money is mainly a priority to everything else, Adrien and Mirjam showed us it is still possible to put Hospitality at nr 1. We came as horselovers and left as family, we will definitely be back!! Wishing you all the best, the crazy sisters from Holland;-)

Amazing and Authentic Way to Experience Argentina. What an extraordinary experience with Adrian and Mariam! Extremely hospitable and true professionals! I would do it again 10x over and would highly recommend to anyone I know visiting BA!

Very special place, unique and exhilerating experience!. Of course it was fabulous to be back in the beautiful Bs As. One of the highlights was being able to return to ride at Caballos A La Par. I always promised myself I would and it surpassed all expectations again. A lot has changed an amazing new place, some lovely new horse and dog friends to greet but still the same passion, commitment and excellent instruction from the owners Adrian and Miriam.This time I was lucky enough to ride Wyoming their new Arabian horse who is very well trained and super comfortable to ride. Not being a frequent rider I was a little concerned I may have lost the skills from my previous visit but it seemed like yesterday when I was back in the saddle. I felt like I was able to build upon the foundations and improve my confidence and connection under the patient and passionate instructorship. I truly love this place, the people, the animals and the park I highly recommend the experience to anyone wishing to ride horses in the stunning Argentinian countryside with genuine and gifted teachers. It is a one of a kind experience that will make you want to go back time and time again. Hasta la proxima!
An Amazing Day. We highly recommend this for riders at any level. Adrian and Miriam are amazing. The ride in the national park was incredible. Anyone in the Buenos Aires, Argentina area must do this!

The highlight of our trip. Spectacular.. After a week in Buenos Aires we were looking for something to do outside the city and thought horseback riding would be a nice break. We were imagining a short, slow "trail ride" along a well-worn trail preceded by limited instruction. Although the TripAdvisor reviews were glowing, nothing prepared us for this wonderful adventure. We were picked up downtown by Adrian and treated to an entertaining and good natured narrative of all that is good and bad about Argentina's economy, politics, culture and society on the short ride to their beautiful stables in the national park. we were introduced to Miriam (Adrian's wonderfully down-to-earth Dutch business partner) their adorable dogs and some of their good tempered and well-cared-for horses.We had booked a “morning:” session – I think the pick-up time was 10 am. We had a nice get-aquainted session over mate (Adrian gave an informative fun “seminar” on it’s preparation, consumption and social traditions) then we got geared up (love their ‘helmets’!) had a short but intense lesson (we were pretty much beginners) which was very useful and made the experience much better and more comfortable than any “trail ride” we had been on in the past.Then off we went for a couple of hours (time flies! It may have been longer) of riding in the beautiful national park surrounding the stables. We could basically go wherever we wished – there was no trail or set plan. Miriam knew the park like the back of her hand. We walked, trotted, cantered – with Miriam’s instruction and encouragement we felt like experienced “gauchos” in no time. The horses were extremely well trained and easy to ride and the park is wide open so you can ride “side-by-side” (as the name implies) and chose your course. Miriam was a charming and pleasant riding companion with perfect English; it was just us two and her and I understand that is typical – the groups are kept very small.After the ride we enjoyed a delicious lunch of empanadas then reluctantly headed back to the city (again the ride was pleasant and included in the price.This experience is worth every peso and has earned every one of the 5 star ratings it has received. Highly recommended.

One of the best horse riding experiences ever!. I was spending the weekend in Buenos Aires and was looking for an opportunity to visit the beautiful Argentinian countryside organizing a horse riding trip. After having discarded some options that appeared way too "touristic", I run across "Caballos a la par" and I was lucky enough that there still was one free spot. It was simply a stunning experience under all points of view. After getting to know Adrian and Miriam enjoying a delicious mate, I met the horses. Theses are undoubtedly the best trained horses I have ever had the chance to ride: besides being so elegant and powerful, they are highly attentive to each instruction and at the same time always at ease while walking, trotting or galloping in the wilderness of the marvelous "El Palmar". If you get used to these horses, it will be difficult to switch to other ones: they simply make horse riding look too easy!! Adrian and Miriam are splendid persons that will welcome you and make you feel at home from the very first second. What stroke me the most is their passion and commitment for what they do: the fact that they organize only "individual" trips is the best proof of their ultimate mission: making sure that which every visitor has the best possible experience with them and with their horses, and returns home with memories that will be hard to forget!

Very special day. From the moment we were picked up it was obvious we weren't just nameless tourists being taken for an idle horse ride. Miriam and Adrian made us feel so at home and relaxed despite us being slightly nervous at being beginners!The horses have lovely temperaments but it's emphasised you're here to learn to ride a horse, not just sit on it while the horse does all the work. Miriam was encouraging in her prompts (of which I needed quite a few) but made it all the more gratifying when you felt how much you were improving. A lunch of homemade empanadas was the perfect end to an extremely special and unforgettable day.

Excellent horse-riding experience. I was in Buenos Aires for a month and treated myself to this experience at the end. I rode one of the Criollos and one of the Arabs and they were both a pleasure to ride. I have been riding since I was a child and have competed in long-distance endurance competitions. I'm usually a bit skeptical about trekking and school horses, but these horses were very different from other horses I have ridden as a tourist. Both were extremely well-trained and reacted to the smallest signal. If you want to go horse riding rather than just sit on a horse, this is for you.

A wonderful and unique experience!. I spent the last day in Buenos Aires with Caballos A La Par (with Miriam and Adrian) and I was so glad that I made the decision to do it. I thought I would be scared and it would be very difficul to be on the horse but after 1 hour I would be able to feel comfortable on the horse and would be able to canter with enjoyment. Both Miriam and Adrian were very nice, friendly and down to earth. Riding the horse under the sun in a lovely park just 30 minutes away from Buenos Aires is an amazing, unreal experience that I would not forget. Thanks Caballos A La Par.

Amazing experience and perfect get-away from busy BA. On the last day of our 3 weeks holiday in Argentina we've had the best end-of-trip experience with Miriam and Adrian, just outside BA. In the morning Adrian picked us up in BA and after a 25 minutes drive we've had a warm welcome at Caballos a la par by Miriam. After the mate ritual and getting to know each other there was a very clear instruction on the riding and the horses which had been selected based on our experience. After some rounds at the ranch we had the best ride with Miriam crossing the park. Even if you have never been on a horse before, you will get good lessons / instructions and are able to have a very nice experience doing all riding skills and tricks ;-)After returning and taking care of the horses there were some very nice empanadas (muchas gracias madre of Juan) and some drinks and good converstations before returning to BA (dropped off by Miriam). Recommend this to every one visiting BA!

Life-changing experience with Caballos A la Par. Our time in Buenos Aires would not have been the same without Caballos a la Par. A few weeks after our trip and we still talk about the very special and unique time we had with Adrian and Miriam, both wonderful, professional and welcoming hosts who introduced us to the world of Mate and horses. We had the chance to ride two sweet, well-trained horses and guided by Adrian we felt at home and felt like we learned in 4 hours what I had tried to master for years. Truly worth your time if you want to experience the Argentinian country-side while also learning the basics of various horseriding styles. Always grateful-Max and Dayra

Welcome in the real life. From the beginning you will be totally immersed in the world of gauchos. Adrien waited for us in his 4X4. When we arrived at the ranch Myriam waited for us with a Matte. I have a very good level and he has a beginner level. I rode a very pleasant horse, Wyoming a Arabian race, my dad rode Isabel a criollo race it had very quiet temper. This was a very good experience and the atmosphere was very friendly! ❤

Very special, very unique riding experience. I have ridden by the Giza pyramids, along the Iceland lava fields, in the dessert of Rajasthan, and more. Caballos a la Par tops them all. Owner/Operator Aidrian and partner Miriam have created a haven for their well trained, well cared for horses in a beautiful setting and provided a unique experience for those of us lucky enough to share it with them. From an easy pick up location in the city to sharing mate before the ride and homemade empanadas after the ride, every extra detail felt like a special gift. They provided excellent hands-on guidance during a personalized Argentinian-style ride through a Unesco heritage bio reserve that I will carry with me forever. They are passionate about what they do - even their rescue dogs are loving and happy! Perfect, memorable day rounding out a wonderful first-time trip to Buenos Aires.

Best horse riding experience ever!. I don't usually write reviews, but Caballos A La Par definitely deserves one. Miriam and Adrian are great hosts and very welcoming. We felt immediately at home. They shared a traditional Argentina ceremony with us, the drinking of Mate. Which was a great experience and a nice way to get to know each other before riding the horses.The horses were really sweet and nice, and also well taken care of. The stables were clean and well maintained. It was good to see that they really cared about their horses. The horse riding itself was great! They gave us enough time to get to know your horse before starting the outdoor riding. We had a group of experienced and not experienced (two had never been on a horse before) riders and they had a matching horse for everyone. They gave us good and constructive instructions while riding the horses. Everyone really enjoyed the outdoor trip we made together, the nature, the horses and the company.I would definitely recommend everyone to go here for a trip and you'll definitely leave with a big smile and great feeling of an amazing day!

Best vacation riding ever!. Caballos A La Par provides a wonderful experience far superior to the typical trail riding for tourists. Adrian and Miriam run a first class operation where the horses are happy, well trained (but by no means dull), and extremely well cared for. Helmets and half chaps are provided, so you do not need to pack much riding gear. They do not mix groups of people, so two of us rode with Adrian for the entire time. He was an enthusiastic teacher, a great guide, and we learned a lot. The park is huge and unspoiled. From our first mate to the post ride empanadas, we felt like welcome friends. This was a highlight of our trip to Argentina, and we recommend it! Mary Lynn and Hernan

A dream getaway in BA. What an incredible place! We were in BA for 6 nights and thought we had seen everything the city had to offer until we headed to Caballos a la Par on our last day. By the time we had been dropped off at the end of the day both my wife and I agreed that it was by far our favourite experience in BA! From the moment you meet Miriam you can tell that she is a warm, friendly and downright delightful person! She makes you feel so comfortable and the whole car ride to the stables we chatted like old friends. Hands down the best thing about this experience is the fact that they don't do big groups and so it was just my wife and I riding through the park with Miriam for over 2 hours. We've both been on lots of other "rides" where it's nose to tail the whole way with a massive group and the horses are happy with going through the old walk-trot-walk routine and have often arrived back at the stables feeling as bored as the horses. The horses at Caballos trained by Adrian and Miriam are completely different!!. They're perfectly (and incredibly sensitively) trained. Just a small movement of the reigns up the neck at any time and they will transition smoothly into a canter that leaves you feeling like you're sitting in an armchair and then when you want to slow down it's just a gentle pull on the reigns instead of an epic tug of war! The horses also have no trouble leading, following or riding side by side and they all get along really well too which is also unique! They also pick the horse for you dependant on your abilities and confidence...and they absolutely nailed it for both my wife (beginner/intermediate) and myself (more experienced). Adrian and Miriam are absolutely delightful people to be around too - genuine, friendly and accommodating. Adrian prepared us matte (Argentinian tea) which was delicious, a great way to get to know each other, and it was really nice to see the process and how the tradition worked. Also, after the ride we came back to the house, sat down around their kitchen table with a cuppa and chatted into the night! Honestly, such genuine, lovely people and such perfectly trained horses, plus a ride through stunning National Parks makes this experience one of the best we've EVER had while travelling! An absolute must!!

Loved the afternoon with Caballos A La Par. This was a great afternoon and I would do it again, in a minute. I don't usually write reviews but this one deserves it. The horses were fantastic, they were so responsive and trusting it makes riding them so much easier than I have ever experienced with other, so called excellent, riding stables. There were two of us with vast differences in riding ability yet Adrian managed to have us both enjoy the time together, a rare skill, but a skill indeed. The horses were brilliant, the people were brilliant, the experience was brilliant. I would recommend it to anyone, a fabulous afternoon and worth every minute of it.

Great horseback riding in a free style. we spent a morning here. Adrian was our guide and he was amazing ! If you want to experience a free and real horseback riding in the woods, this is the place! We were received by Adrian, who spent some time with us to understand our level of horseback riding and personality to match it to the horses. We drank some mate and off we went. The horses were great, easy to manage. The place is huge and you really feel you are not near Buenos aires. We spent around 3 hours and so on the horses, galloping and also experiencing some synchronized horseback riding. Even if you have never horseback ride, this is the place to try it and if you are experienced, this is too. I totally recommend it.

Incredible unique experience! Unforgettable!. Every chance I get to ride horses on any vacation I take it. This is by far the best experience I've had horse riding as a tourist. When I booked on the internet, I thought it was a group excursion, but it is actually reserving an entire day/private tour with the folks who own and train the horses. Miriam and Adrian met with me before the ride to ask what I wanted to do, and determine experience. I asked to learn any Argentinean styles. Miriam and I took the horses up the road and into the national park and rode for hours. I learned so much and she even had me change horses to practice my new skills on a different horse. It was an absolute privilege to have this type of experience in Argentina. I was so lucky to have found them. If you want to really ride horses when you visit, call this ranch.

Great horse riding experience . We had a wonderful day out at the stables of Miriam and Adrian!! After experiencing the local tea and getting to know each other we got onto the horses. Adrian took us out and we couldn't have asked for a better teacher or better trained horses! Some things are challenging to begin with l, but with Adrian's help we managed to learn all the basics. After a great horse riding experience through the forest we ended the day with homemade empanadas and a cold beer, which were both delicious. We highly recommend this for anyone and if you like a more personal experience this is the place you're looking for.

Amazing day out of BA city. My partner and I shared an amazing day with Adrian and Miriam in early August. Adrian collected us from our meeting point in the city and drove us out to their stables bordering the national park. Adrian and Miriam made us feel super comfortable and we had a great chat over mate (tea) about life in BA and their horses. Following this we went to meet our horses for the few hours we would spend with Adrian riding in the park. We were given a good intro and briefing to the horses and the riding style and were on our way. Adrian is a FANTASTIC guide/instructor/teacher and both my partner and I felt like we learnt a lot to improve our riding (we are probably intermediate level) regardless of riding style (western vs English). We definitely feel as though we came away with more confidence and new skills - I didn't think I would be cantering one handed after only a couple of hours! After riding around the beautiful park (freely - not following a set path or route), we went back and had a beer and empanadas with Adrian and Miriam which was really great. Finished the day with Adrian dropping us back in the city.For anyone looking for a real experience with Argentine horses, I 110% recommend this day. It is not for you if you are expecting an easy nose to tail (aka boring) trail ride. Adrian and Miriam want you to learn and be a bit challenged by the activity and to improve your skills. We both had a great time and would recommend to anyone heading to BA who would like to have some time with horses and get out and see a bit of the countryside.THANK YOU!

Favorite part of our trip!!! . We had the best time riding with Caballos a la Par!!! As a couple with absolutely no experience with horses, Adrian and Miriam made us feel right at home on their beautiful countryside farm! The instruction is world-class, challenging, fun and you won't believe what you're able to with a horse by the end of the lesson! Adrian and Miriam are truly beautiful people-- you'll feel like best friends when it's over!

Truly Incredible. What can I say more than utterly amazing! One of the greatest experiences of my life! My family and I had come to Argentina for summer holidays and we all love horseback riding, and since we were in the land of horses, it was a must. Through tripadvisor and other websites, we found this hidden gem, and undoubtedly it was the highlight of our trip. Adrian picked us up at our hotel, warmly greeting us with a customary kiss, and whisked us away into the beautiful surrounding countryside of Buenos Aires. Upon our arrival, we were greeted by Miriam and the energetic band of dogs. We were also introduced to the lovely volunteer, Maria. They gave us a tour of the property and the high level of care given to the horses was evident. Few other places I have been to have exhibited this standard. All the horses were well groomed and had a clean/insulated barn to go to for the night, as it was winter and very cold. We then enjoyed a traditional Argentine mate, my very first, and were instructed in the rituals of drinking and serving. Adrian and Miriam told us about how they began horseback riding and why the started the business, and after donning helmets and half-chaps we were ready to go! Adrian gave us a quick demo on the basics such as turning, and explained the way the horse were trained using the A La Par method. We rode through beautiful fields and wooded areas on some of the most stunning horses I have ever seen much less ridden. Indio, Isabel, Lindo, and Sheik all were calm yet had a lively step and were a pleasure to ride. Miriam had us practice cantering and trotting, and then took it up a level by doing it standing up and without hands. There were exercise a like trying to trot as slowly as possible without the horse walking. Finally to top it off Miriam had us ride under a low hanging branch while controlling our body position as well as the horse. We arrived back for some excellent Argentine facturas (little pastries) and wished we could have spent weeks and weeks riding with them. Adrian then drove us back to the hotel and we thanked him for such a memorable day. Caballos A La Par is such a unique place, with fantastic horses and such inspiring people who are running it. The ideas on which Miriam and Adrian have built the way they train the horses and teach you to ride are so cool and it provides for a custom riding experience tailored to fit your level as well as the people you come riding with (although they never mix groups). It mixes Argentine culture and wonderful horseback riding to create a memorable expirience my family and so will never forget.
Challenging horseriding!. Very personal training in beautiful area. Well-trained horses.Argentinian Adrian and Dutch Miriam do their utmost best to make you feel comfortable on horseback.

Beautiful horses, beautiful scenery, beautiful people!. Adrian and Miriam provided myself and my friend with by far and away the highlight of our trip through Argentina and Brazil. For anyone interested in seeing rural Argentina, with any standard of horse riding experience, I would highly recommend! Waking up to grey and overcast skies, we were a little skeptical and were pleasantly surprised when Adrian gave us the option to reschedule upon meeting in the morning. However to anyone who finds themselves in a similar situation, I assure you that despite non perfect weather we still had a fantastic day and say the national park in all of its beauty! We were welcomed warmly and treated as equals rather than students. Will certainly be back when I next return to the area, especially to see Indigo the best horse ever!

Amazing, Memorable Experience! . Caballos A La Par provides a wonderful opportunity to ride horses in Buenos Aires. I truly wish I had found them earlier during my trip so that I could return each weekend. Every aspect of the experience, from the pick-up, to the horseback ride, to the lunch was enjoyable. Miriam and Adrian are passionate about horses and teaching you to ride with proper technique while having fun. As other reviewers have mentioned, this is not a group-based, touristy horseback ride. Instead, it is a private, tailor-made experience to ride a variety of well trained horses in a unique setting. This is truly something that should not be missed, it is worth every penny, and will stay with you forever.

Highlight of our trip to South America. Whilst travelling through Brazil, Argentina, Uruguay & Paraguay, nothing else has come close to experience we had the day we spent here! I went with a friend of mine (both of us boys) and the hospitality, the facilities, the level of teaching, literally everything was excellent and much more than we had expected. The owners are two incredible people with a lot of passion in what they do, their horses are very well trained and the national park where you ride is stunning. My friend and I would highly recommend going!

Best Part of the Trip!!!. We are both adults who have never ridden a horse before. We approached the day with a bit of fear. Our concerns were misplaced. Our hosts were amazing, like family. They made us feel welcomed and put us at ease. We had a beautiful ride through the park. We highly recommend Caballos A La Par for adults and children.

A perfect days riding in a great location. We are experienced riders and we have our own horses. We wanted to learn more about Argentine horsemanship and enjoy riding good horses. The horses that we were given to ride were very well schooled, forward going, but relaxed. We both wanted to ride the Argentine Criollo horses, but there are also Arabs, quarter horses and other breeds on the property.We gave Miriam detailed information about our experiences and preferences and we got perfect matches. The trips are customised for you, so take the time to think about what you want from the day. The area you ride in is an old estancia, now a national park. There is a lot of open grass and woodland so it is perfect riding country and it is huge. You will need to adjust to riding Argentine style as that is the way that the horses are schooled - but that just adds to the experience.Adrian and Miriam have created something very special with this business. When we weren't riding we were talking horses over beer and empanadas afterwards. I now consider Adrian and Miriam as friends and I would love to see them come to visit us in New Zealand.

I would recommend everyone who love horses to come to Caballos A La Par!. I wish I would have found this gem as soon as I arrived to BA so that I could have been able to come every weekend during my stay! Reading the Tripadvisor reviews, it seemed too good to be true but it isn't. Miriam and Adrian take great care of their guests, and their horses are amazing. This place has earned every 5 star review!

Best ride ever!. My boyfriend and I went last week, it was the best horse riding experience ever! They were so kind and friendly, at the same time, they taught us some amazing skills for horse back riding. Both of us LOVED it so much, they took care of us. Horses there are beautiful too, we are going back there again this weekend it was that much fun!!!!!

Best Riding Experience in South America Better Than Ever !!!!. I was fortunate to have the opportunity to ride with Adrian and Miriam again on my recent visit to B.A. They have over a dozen well bred well trained horses and can accommodate anyone from a first timer to those who've owned their own horses and riden for years. All come away having learned something from these world class experts in a setting that is as hospitable as visiting a close friends ranch for the day. Truly an experience not to be missed for anyone who like horses.

Beautiful scenery, lovely horses. I visited Caballos a la Par with two friends, one whom had recently moved to Buenos Aires and had already been for a riding lesson with Adrian (the owner).Adrian was very helpful and friendly, picking us up from Buenos Aires (as we did not have a car) and offering to share Mate (a traditional Argentinian drink) with us prior to our ride. When we were ready, we went to meet our horses and Adrian showed us in no uncertain terms how to control the horses (in very good English!).
